#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
    ll i,c,t,n,st;
    ll cal=0;
    vector<ll> v(10001);
    for(i=1;i<=10000;i++)
    {
        c=i;
        st=0;
        while(c%5==0)
        {
            st++;
            c/=5;
        }
        v[i]=cal+st*i;
        cal=cal+st*i;
    }
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        printf("%lld\n",v[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
